<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzinstrinfo">SystemZInstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzsubtarget/#a14dcf0fbd3cd8fd45c8f5e915ddfaead">getInstrInfo</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t Disp = ADATable.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> TargetReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    Disp += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(3).getImm();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadAddr = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOpcode() == SystemZ::ADA&#95;ENTRY;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Op0 = LoadAddr ? SystemZ::LA : SystemZ::LG;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getOpcodeForOffset(Op0, Disp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> IndexReg = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TargetReg != ADAReg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">        IndexReg = TargetReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use TargetReg to store displacement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a1b02eda9bb97934fbcc3d7f29219b931">EmitToStreamer</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstbuilder">MCInstBuilder</a>(SystemZ::LLILF).addReg(TargetReg).addImm(Disp));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We want to emit &quot;j .+2&quot; for traps, jumping to the relative immediate field</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the jump instruction, which is an illegal instruction. We cannot emit a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;.&quot; symbol, so create and emit a temp label before the instruction and use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcconstantexpr">MCConstantExpr</a> &#42;ConstExpr = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcconstantexpr/#af9bdc4c9c65ea1ff077fbbb6407d7b2a">MCConstantExpr::create</a>(2, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#aa7625af893e242d33b9f182066f59310">OutContext</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the relative immediate field of the jump instruction. (eg. &quot;jo .+2&quot;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
